div.p: AND FINALLY TONIGHT, THE TIP OF THE DAY, WISING UP, THE KIDS,
THE NEW BOOK OUT CALLED "THE SMARTEST KIDS IN THE WORLD."
THE KIDS IN FINLAND, OTHER PARTS OF THE WORLD ARE DOING BETTER.
WHEN THE RESEARCHER AT NORTHWESTERN UNIVERSITY STUDIED
OVER 4,000 TEENS IN THE U.S. AND THEIR PARENTS, HE FOUND THAT
KIDS WITH AUTHORATATIVE PARENTS HAD FEWER PROBLEMS WITH
AGGRESSION HAD FEWER PROBLEMS, IT DOES SEEM TO WORK.
IT DOES WORK, HERE IS THE TIP, BE AUTHORITATIVE BUT KIND, MAKE
ACADEMICS AS FUN AS YOU CAN. REWARD THE URCHINS WHEN YOU CAN.
IF YOU CAN MAKE IT A GAME, MAKE IT A GAME.
DON'T WIMP OUT, THOUGH, KIDS HAVE TO STUDY AND DO THE WORK.
IF THEY WANT TO SUCCEED IN LIFE, THEY HAVE TO SUCCEED IN SCHOOL.
BACK TO TIP OF THE DAY. AND THAT IS IT FOR US TODAY.
